text: Lisa Bonet (born Lisa Michelle Bonet; November 16, 1967), also known as Lilakoi Moon, is an American actress. She is best known for her roles as Denise Huxtable on television series, The Cosby Show and A Different World. She was also married to singer Lenny Kravitz from 1987 to 1993. She is of African American and Ashkenazi Jewish descent. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Bonet,Lisa Category:Actors from San Francisco Category:African- American actors Category:Jewish American actors
title: Lisa Bonet
